mapper.insert: INSERT INTO flash_mastery.folders (id, name, description, color, deck_count, parent_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{color}, #{deckCount}, #{parentId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
